TypeSignature.Value: public class Timer : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class Timer Inherits Control Implements IPostBackEventHandler, IScriptControl
public ref class Timer : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl
type Timer = class inherit Control interface IPostBackEventHandler interface IScriptControl

summary.span: 在定义的时间间隔执行异步或同步网页回发。

span.span: Performs asynchronous or synchronous Web page postbacks at a defined interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 控件，可以按指定的时间间隔执行回发。The control enables you to perform postbacks at a specified interval. 当使用 控件作为 控件的触发器时， 控件将使用异步的部分页面更新进行更新。When you use the control as a trigger for an control, the control is updated by using an asynchronous, partial-page update. 必须在网页中包含一个 对象，才能使用 控件。You must include a object in a Web page to use the control. 通过在 控件内包含计时器，使用 控件来更新 控件。You use the control to update an control by including the timer inside the control. 或者，可以将计时器置于 控件外，并将计时器设置为触发器。Alternatively, you can place the timer outside the control and set the timer as a trigger. 还可以通过在网页中包含 "" 控件，而不是将其设置为 控件的触发器，来启动整个网页的完全回发。You can also initiate full postback of a complete Web page by including the control in the Web page and not setting it as a trigger for an control. 通过为 事件创建事件处理程序，可以在计时器间隔结束后运行服务器代码。You can run server code when the timer interval has elapsed by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中，可以包括用于动态调整 控件的行为的代码。In the event handler, you can include code that dynamically adjusts the behavior of the control. 设置 属性以指定发生回发的频率。Set the property to specify how often postbacks will occur. 设置 属性以打开或关闭 。Set the property to turn the on or off. > [!NOTE] > 控件回发到 Web 服务器时的准确性取决于浏览器中运行的 ECMAScript （JavaScript） `window.setTimeout` 函数的准确性。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that is running in the browser. 属性以毫秒为单位定义。The property is defined in milliseconds. 必须将 属性设置为一个值，以便在启动下一个回发之前至少完成一个异步回发。You must set the property to a value that lets at least one asynchronous postback complete before the next postback is initiated. 当 控件位于 控件之外时，计时器将继续运行，同时刷新 控件的内容。When the control is outside an control, the timer continues to run while the content of the control is refreshed. 如果在处理较早的回发时启动了新的回发，则将取消第一个回发。If a new postback is initiated while an earlier postback is being processed, the first postback will be canceled. 默认值为60000毫秒（60秒）。The default value is 60,000 milliseconds (60 seconds). > [!NOTE] > 在 属性中添加具有较小值的 控件可能会产生与 Web 服务器之间的大量通信。Adding a control with a small value in the property can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 根据需要，使用 控件来仅刷新内容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 控件，该控件显示随机生成的股票价格和生成股票价格的时间。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件每10秒更新一次 控件中的内容。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中，计时器间隔设置为10秒，以便在运行该示例时，无需等待很长时间即可查看结果。In this example, the timer interval is set to 10 seconds so that when you run the example, you do not have to wait a long time to see the results. 由于每个计时器间隔导致回发导致网络流量，因此在生产应用程序中，应将间隔设置为应用程序仍然可行的最长时间。Because each timer interval causes a postback that causes network traffic, in a production application you should set the interval to the longest time that is still practical for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件在经过 属性中指定的毫秒数后是否启动到服务器的回发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control initiates a postback to the server after the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed.

value.span: 如果 将启动回发，则为;否则，。

span.span: if will initiate a postback; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以打开和关闭 控件。Use the property to turn the control on and off. 将 设置为 `true`时， 控件在呈现网页时将启动其计时器倒计时。When you set to `true`, the control starts its timer countdown when the Web page is rendered. 在回发时，可以在 "" 属性中更改属性值，在浏览器中呈现网页内容时，将反映这些更改。On postback, you can change property values in the property, and the changes will be reflected when the Web page content is rendered in the browser. 如果更改 属性，然后在同一回发过程中将其更改回其原始值，则 控件将按原样运行，就像未进行任何更改一样。If you change the property and then change it back to its original value during the same postback, the control runs as if no change had been made. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 控件，该控件显示随机生成的股票价格和生成股票价格的时间。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 默认情况下， 控件每10秒更新 控件中的内容。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 用户可以决定每隔10秒、每60秒钟更新一次股票价格，或者根本不更新。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 当用户决定不更新股票价格时， 属性设置为 `false`。When the user decides not to update the stock price, the property is set to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在启动回发之前需要等待的毫秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.

value.span: 启动回发之前要等待的毫秒数。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.
The default value is 60,000 (60 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性设置 控件启动向服务器回发的频率。Use the property to set how often the control initiates a postback to the server. 在回发之后，可以在服务器代码中更改 属性的值，例如在 事件的事件处理程序中。You can change the value of the property in server code after a postback, such as in an event handler for the event. 控件回发到 Web 服务器时的准确性取决于在浏览器中运行的 ECMAScript （JavaScript） `window.setTimeout` 函数的准确性。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that runs in the browser. > [!NOTE] > 将 属性设置为一个较小的值可能会与 Web 服务器之间产生大量的流量。Setting the property to a small value can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 根据需要，使用 控件来仅刷新内容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. 更改 属性的值时，在浏览器中运行的 ECMAScript 计时代码将在呈现更新时重置。When you change the value of the property, the ECMAScript timing code running in the browser will be reset when the updates are rendered. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 控件，该控件显示随机生成的股票价格和生成股票价格的时间。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 默认情况下， 控件每10秒更新 控件中的内容。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 用户可以决定每隔10秒、每60秒钟更新一次股票价格，或者根本不更新。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 属性设置为用户的选择。The property is set to the user's choice. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified value is less than or equal to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性中指定的毫秒数已过，或者自上一次 事件之后，就会引发 事件。The event is raised when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed either since the Web page was rendered or since the previous event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 控件，该控件显示随机生成的股票价格和生成股票价格的时间。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件每10秒更新一次 控件中的内容。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 股票价格和时间在 事件的处理程序中设置。The stock price and the time are set in a handler for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的毫秒数自上一次呈现或自上一个 事件之后，就会引发 事件。The event is raised when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed either since the Web page was last rendered or since the previous event. 当必须在每次回发过程中执行操作时，处理 事件。Handle the event when you have to perform actions during each postback. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 控件，该控件显示随机生成的股票价格和生成股票价格的时间。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件每10秒更新一次 控件中的内容。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 股票价格和时间在 事件的处理程序中设置。The stock price and the time are set in a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 重写 类的 属性可以禁止设置此值。

span.span: Overrides the property of the class to prevent this value from being set.

value.span: 如果控件在页面上呈现，则 ;否则，。

span.span: if the control is rendered on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Visible` 属性在 类中被重写，以防止设置此属性。The `Visible` property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. 如果 类的客户端组件包含在网页中，则 `Visible` 属性将返回 `true`，即使 设置为 `false`。The `Visible` property returns `true` if the client component of the class is included in the Web page, even if is set to `false`. 当 `Visible` 属性位于某个容器（如 控件）中时，该属性将返回 `false`，其 `Visible` 属性设置为 `false`。The `Visible` property returns `false` when it is inside a container, such as an control, whose `Visible` property is set to `false`.

exception.span: 将一个值分配给 Visible 属性。

span.span: A value is assigned to the Visible property.
